data.name: Nebula
data.description: A ruthless attacker who assails opponents with frequent attacks.

starItems.name: Nebula
starItems.description: A ruthless attacker who assails opponents with frequent attacks.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Always gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health.
Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> of target's Max Health

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health.
Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, always chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, always chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, always chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> for self
Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to secondary targets
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>10</color> adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, chain to <color=#86e619>10</color> adjacent targets.
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain. If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
Attacks always Crit if the target is Summoned or Cloned.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally. On Revive, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Gamora ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Assist Chance + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally. On Revive, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Gamora ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Assist Chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally. On Revive, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Gamora ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Assist Chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade: On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Gamora ally

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally. On Revive, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> + <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Gamora ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Assist Chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Assist Chance
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Assist Chance per <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally. On Revive, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> + <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Gamora ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Assist Chance + <color=#86e619>20%</color> per <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.
